title: RAK13002 WisBlock IO Module Datasheet > RAK13002 WisBlock IO Module Datasheet > Overview > Description > RAK13002 WisBlock Core Adaptor Module Overview
content: The RAK13002 is a WisBlock Core adaptor module that can be mounted to the IO slot of the WisBlock Base board. This module exposed all WisBlock Core signals such as I2C, SPI, UART, GPIO, and ADC to standard 2.54mm pitch pin header for easy integration of external components and devices.
parent_content: The RAK13002 is a WisBlock Core adaptor module that can be mounted to the IO slot of the WisBlock Base board. This module exposed all WisBlock Core signals such as I2C, SPI, UART, GPIO, and ADC to standard 2.54mm pitch pin header for easy integration of external components and devices.

title: RAK13002 WisBlock IO Module Datasheet > RAK13002 WisBlock IO Module Datasheet > Specifications > Overview > Mounting > RAK13002 Module Mounting on WisBlock Base Board
content:
The RAK13002 module can be mounted to the IO slot of the WisBlock Base board. Figure 1 shows the mounting mechanism of the RAK13002 on a WisBlock Base module.  
> **Image:** RAK13002 WisBlock Adaptor Module Mounting
parent_content:
The RAK13002 module can be mounted to the IO slot of the WisBlock Base board. Figure 1 shows the mounting mechanism of the RAK13002 on a WisBlock Base module.  
> **Image:** RAK13002 WisBlock Adaptor Module Mounting

title: RAK13002 WisBlock IO Module Datasheet > RAK13002 WisBlock IO Module Datasheet > Specifications > Hardware > Pin Definition > RAK13002 WisBlock Adaptor Module Pinout [TABLE]
content:
The RAK13002 WisBlock Adaptor Module comprises a standard WisConnector connector. The WisConnector allows the RAK13002 module to be mounted to a WisBlock Base board. The pin order of the connector and the pinout definition is shown in Figure 2.  
> **Image:** RAK13002 WisBlock Adaptor Module Pinout
parent_content:
The RAK13002 WisBlock Adaptor Module comprises a standard WisConnector connector. The WisConnector allows the RAK13002 module to be mounted to a WisBlock Base board. The pin order of the connector and the pinout definition is shown in Figure 2.  
> **Image:** RAK13002 WisBlock Adaptor Module Pinout
